Name: !eyeonthedoor
Miss: You're caught vulnerable, half in and half out
Hit: You can go, or stay, but if you go it will cost you: leave something behind or take something with you, the MC will tell you what.
Crit: You're gone. Puff of smoke, like real magic shit.

Name: !reputation
Miss: They've heard of you all right. The MC will tell you what they heard. Probably nothing good cho'.
Hit: They've heard of you, and you say what they've heard; the MC will make them respond accordingly.
Crit: They've heard of you, and you say what they've heard; the MC will make them respond accordingly, and you get +1forward for dealing with them.
